name: Ramen gang-chan's adventure
description:
This game is based on Ramen-Gang chan, one of the discord server mascot.

It's a short 2D platformer  about Ramen-Gang chan trying to find all stolen ramen and defeat the ramen stealer, can she do it? It all depens on you!

_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

This is my first game ever made, so constructive critique is really welome, so i can improve in my next projects! Also all sprites and music in this game was made by me.

I hope that not only members of that server but also other people will find this game fun and interesting to play.

Cool features in game :

-Cutscenes

-Ramen Collecting

-Crab enemies

-Over 3 levels

-Moving platforms

-Spikes

To fix / add:

- Fix cutscene bug

-Add checkpoints

-Add sound more effects

-Make death less dramaic

NOTE: May not download if your antivirus is on
